code: @Test public void verifyProducerTemplate() {     assertThat("Producer template Camel context is incorrect!", inbound.getCamelContext().getName(), is(equalTo("test"))).     assertThat("Producer template cache size is incorrect!", inbound.getMaximumCacheSize(), is(equalTo(100))).     assertThat("Producer template default endpoint is incorrect!", inbound.getDefaultEndpoint().getEndpointUri(), is(equalTo("direct://inbound"))). }

@Test public void sendMessageToInbound() throws InterruptedException {     outbound.expectedMessageCount(1).     outbound.expectedBodiesReceived("message").     inbound.sendBody("message").     assertIsSatisfied(2L, TimeUnit.SECONDS, outbound). }
